title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Apr 23 WE [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Wednesday, 23 April 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Wednesday, April 23 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex breaks down the continued encroachment of federal government into all aspects of American life and the escalating war tensions across the globe. 

The N.Y. State Division of Homeland Security is now urging businesses to snitch on survivalists and preppers as potential terrorists. 

And around the world, the crisis in Ukraine is escalating and the standoff between China and Japan could explode into war. 

Intelligence experts Doug Hagmann and Joe Hagmann join today's show to discuss the widespread corruption and fraud seeping through all levels of government.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
